remarks: Lemma for ~ pnt .  Closure for the constants used in the proof.  For comparison with Equation 10.6.27 of [Shapiro], p. 434, ` A ` is C^*, ` B ` is c_1, ` L ` is λ, ` D ` is c_2, and ` F ` is c_3. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2016.)
statement:
pntlem1.r $e |- R = ( a e. RR+ |-> ( ( psi ` a ) - a ) ) $.
pntlem1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
pntlem1.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
pntlem1.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( 0 (,) 1 ) ) $.
pntlem1.d $e |- D = ( A + 1 ) $.
pntlem1.f $e |- F = ( ( 1 - ( 1 / D ) ) x. ( ( L / ( ; 3 2 x. B ) ) / ( D ^ 2 ) ) ) $.
pntlemd $p |- ( ph -> ( L e. RR+ /\ D e. RR+ /\ F e. RR+ ) ) $.
